response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. The product is valued at $12,000 to us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its worth to you is estimated at $8,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 9500}
